ActionTile - Class in it.polimi.se2019.model.game
 
ActionTile() - Constructor for class it.polimi.se2019.model.game.ActionTile
 
ActionTileFrenzy - Class in it.polimi.se2019.model.game
 
ActionTileFrenzy(int) - Constructor for class it.polimi.se2019.model.game.ActionTileFrenzy
This constructor, depending on the player's number in the list sets its number of actions It's important to remember that depending on the actionCounter value you have two different sets of available moves: if you have 2 actions you can either choose from: move up to 1 square, reload if you want, then shoot; move up to 4 square; move up to 2 squares and grab something there.
ActionTileNormal - Class in it.polimi.se2019.model.game
 
ActionTileNormal() - Constructor for class it.polimi.se2019.model.game.ActionTileNormal
The constructor sets actionCounter = 2 for every tile the variables adrenalineMode 1 and 2 set the freedom to do the special attacks that the player can do after have 3 or 6 damage points, so setting to false at the beginning of the game

askAction(ActionRequestView, int) - Method in interface it.polimi.se2019.network.RMIInterface
 
askAction(ActionRequestView, int) - Method in class it.polimi.se2019.view.RemoteView
 
AvailableActions - Class in it.polimi.se2019.controller
This class builds the message object that the ActionManager in controller builds and sends over to the Client to choose from In the Normal 1 combination (move, move, move) you will only use the cell object In the Normal 2 combination (move,(move) grab) you will only use the cell object In the Normal 3 combination ((move), shoot) you will use the cell object and an object for each card in your hand that indicates if you can use it and in which way The client will then build an "answer object" containing his selection
AvailableActions(ActionRequestView, int, Controller) - Constructor for class it.polimi.se2019.controller.AvailableActions
Method that calculates the actions available to a player during a certain turn (after the selection of a macro action)
availableCoordinates(CellView) - Method in class it.polimi.se2019.view.MapView
returns a list of all the available coordinates in a map removing the ones where the player currently is
